name: Monotone (shrain)
description:
Monotone is a rogue-like game about going to dungeons and getting stronger each level with the help of the mutations, its made in 2 days for DiscordJam#5. We tried our best but sadly couldn't finish the game as we wanted. It's not what we have in mind but we as a team put our best efforts in it. Hope you enjoy it.

Credits:

  • Programming:
  • goro - https://itch.io/profile/hardrain                                          
  • Graphics and PixelArt: 
  • shrain - https://shrain.itch.io
  • Music and SFX:
  • jezjez - https://jezjez.bandcamp.com/
